## Suspected Threat Category

Which type of threat do you suspect? (Select all that apply)

- [ ] Credential harvesting or data exfiltration
- [ ] Malicious code execution (ClawHavoc or similar)
- [ ] Prompt injection or goal hijacking
- [ ] Supply chain vulnerability (malicious dependency)
- [ ] Unauthorized network communication
- [ ] Post-installation code modification (sleeper agent)
- [ ] Sensitive data exposure
- [ ] Other (describe below)
